```{r workspace}
library(tidyverse)
options(scipen = 999)

points_start <-
  #create a base table
    tibble(circumf = seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 7),
           x1 = sin(circumf)*100,
           y1 = cos(circumf)*100, 0) %>% 
  #find next point for each vertex   
    mutate(x2 = lead(x1, default = 0),
           y2 = lead(y1, default = 1),
           vertex = row_number()) %>%
  #round evrything  
    mutate_all(.funs = funs(round(., 0))) %>% 
    select(vertex, x1, y1, x2, y2) 
```

```{r test_plot}
ggplot(points_start, aes(x1, y1, label = vertex)) +
  geom_polygon(alpha = .2) +
  geom_point(size = 10, color = "white", stroke = 1) +
  geom_text() +
  coord_fixed()
```


```{r for_loop}
#base table for the for loop
  points_all <-
    tibble(layer = 0, 
           hex_ord = 1, 
           vertex = 1, 
           mids = 0,
           x = 0, 
           y = 0)

#for loop to generate expanded grid of points
  for(i in 1:6){
    points_loop <-
        #create table for each vertex and midpoints in-between
          expand.grid(vertex = 1:6,
                      mids = 0:(i-1),
                      KEEP.OUT.ATTRS = F) %>% 
          arrange(vertex) %>%
        #join in the coordinates
          left_join(points_start) %>%
        #add layer level, order per layer and final coordinates
          mutate(layer = i,
                 hex_ord = row_number(),
                 x = (x1 + mids/i * (x2 - x1))*i,
                 y = (y1 + mids/i * (y2 - y1)) * i) %>% 
          select(one_of(colnames(points_all)))
      
    #create master table
      points_all <-
        rbind(points_all, points_loop)
  }
```

```{r for_loop2}
points_spiral_base <-
    points_all %>% 
    arrange(layer, hex_ord) %>% 
    mutate(ord_spiral = row_number()) 

points_spiral_table <-
  points_spiral_base[1,] %>% 
  mutate(ord2 = 0,
         hex_ord2 = 0)

#generate spiral/star arangement
 for(i in 1:6){
    #i = 3
    points_base <-
      points_spiral_base %>% 
      filter(layer == i)
    
    points_base1 <-
      filter(points_base, hex_ord >= 2) %>% 
      rbind(filter(points_base, hex_ord < 2)) %>% 
      mutate(ord2 = row_number(),
             hex_ord2 = ord2 %% (i), 
             hex_ord2 = ifelse(hex_ord2 == 0, i, hex_ord2)) 
     
    points_spiral_table <-
      rbind(points_spiral_table, points_base1)
 }

```

```{r}
#final dataset
points_final <-
  points_spiral_table %>%
  arrange(layer, hex_ord2, ord2) %>% 
  mutate(ord_star = row_number()) %>% 
  select(-hex_ord2, -ord2) %>% 
  arrange(x, y) %>% 
  mutate(by_x = row_number()) %>% 
  arrange(y, x) %>% 
  mutate(by_y = row_number()) %>% 
  arrange(vertex, ord_spiral) %>% 
  mutate(by_vertex = row_number())
```

```{r charts}
plot_points <-
  function(get_var){
    points_final %>% 
    mutate_(var = get_var) %>% 
    arrange(var, ord_spiral) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x, y, label = round(var, 0))) +
      geom_path(aes(group = var, color = factor(var)), 
                size = 2, alpha = .9) +
      geom_point(aes(0,0), size = 14) +
      geom_point(aes(fill = factor(var)), size = 10, 
                 alpha = .8, pch = 21) +
      geom_text(size = 3) +
      guides(color = F, fill = F) +
      coord_fixed() +
      theme_void()
}

plot_points("layer")
###plot_points("hex_ord")
plot_points("vertex")
###plot_points("mids")
plot_points("x")
plot_points("y")
plot_points("ord_spiral") + geom_path(group = 1, alpha = .4)
#plot_points("ord2")
plot_points("ord3") + geom_path(group = 1, alpha = .4)
plot_points("by_vertex") + geom_path(group = 1, alpha = .4)
plot_points("by_x") + geom_path(group = 1, alpha = .4)
plot_points("by_y") + geom_path(group = 1, alpha = .4)
# "layer" "hex_ord"   "vertex"  "mids"  "x" "y" "ord" 
# "ord2"  "hex_ord2"  "ord3"  

write_csv(points_final, "packed_bubbles.csv")
```
